LIKE NEW Uppland Sofa - Light Gray,"3 Seater Sofa with 6 years of warranty. Retail price $849
Color is light gray and cover is fabric. Barely used!
Never exposed to dogs, carts or smoke.
Pick up directly on the first floor.
Enjoy the super comfy UPPLAND sofa with embracing feel and deep seat cushions made of pocket springs, high resilience foam and polyester fibers, adding both firm support and relaxing softness.

Reversible back cushions provide soft support for your back and two different sides to wear. Thanks to the combination of polyester fibers and cut foam the cushions will retain their shape and comfort year after year.",,,
